name: Energy Out
description: Energy out is a platformer in which 4 brave robots: a warrior, an archer, a magician and a necromancer have to overcome various obstacles. But every 10 seconds they turn off, because there is not enough energy in their batteries all the time. Each robot is designed for its own purposes: a warrior is stupid, he can only hit with his hand, an archer is fast and can shoot, a magician can drag objects to locations and disabled robots, and a necromancer can resurrect fallen comrades.
